translationtableentry.text: Villaggi e forti colmi d'oro. Colui che riuscirà a conquistarli potrà creare l'esercito più grande.
translationtableentry.result: Villages and outposts full of gold. Whoever manages to take them will be able to create the largest army.

translationtableentry.text: Aldeas y fortines repletos de oro. Quien consiga capturarlos podrá crear el mayor de los ejércitos.
